scripts.recreate:directus: docker compose rm -sf directus && docker compose up -d --build directus
scripts.recreate:website: docker compose rm -sf website && docker compose up -d --build website
scripts.prod: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d --build --scale website=4
scripts.schema:snapshot: docker compose exec directus npx directus schema snapshot /directus/schema.yaml && docker compose cp directus:/directus/schema.yaml ./directus/schema.yaml
scripts.schema:apply: docker compose exec directus npx directus schema apply /directus/schema.yaml
scripts.schema:diff: docker compose exec directus npx directus schema diff /directus/schema.yaml
scripts.db:migrate: docker compose exec directus npx directus database migrate:latest
scripts.db:rollback: docker compose exec directus npx directus database migrate:down
scripts.generate:migration: cd directus && npx directus database migrate:create rename_me
